author: rubys
msg: Default xsi:type via reflection when methods are not overloaded
Invoke per-service method to register types BEFORE deserialization. ;-)
Add a test for deserializing arrays

author: gdaniels
msg: Couple of quick changes to better support cases where we're doing
messaging-style processing (and hence not deserializing).  These make
sure that all SAX events get recorded and played back correctly in the
case where we have a ServiceDescription that has "isRPC" set to false.
Again, I expect this architecture will be refactored somewhat over the next
few weeks to be cleaner and more based around the concept of "Service",
so a lot of these little strangenesses should go away.

author: rubys
msg: Now both serialize and deserialize work again
